generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the road, bordered by a curb and lined with greenery.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including multi-story structures with windows and architectural details.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are present along the sidewalks and in the background, indicating significant vegetation.
- sky: The sky is visible through the tree canopy, showing a clear blue sky with some clouds.
- person: A person can be seen walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are parked or driving on the road, including a silver car in the foreground.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible on the road, being ridden by a person.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a white "P" (indicating parking) is visible on the right side of the road.
- pole: A pole is visible on the right side of the road, supporting the traffic sign.
- rider: A rider is visible on the motorcycle, wearing a helmet and riding on the road.
